title: Macaroni and Cheese
instructions: Prepare macaroni according to directions. Drain. Preheat oven to 375Â°. In medium saucepan, melt margarine; stir in flour, mustard and salt. Gradually stir in milk. Cook and stir until mixture thickens slightly (should coat spoon). Remove from heat. Add 1 1/2 c. cheese, stir until melted. Stir in cooked macaroni. Turn into greased 1 1/2 qt. shallow baking dish. Top with remaining cheese. Bake 20-25 mins. or until bubbly.
